title: Millie Bright  brave  to pull out of England camp because of burnout , teammate Bronze says

Millie Bright’s decision to withdraw from international duty for England’s women’s team because of mental and physical burnout has been hailed as “brave” by teammate Lucy Bronze. Bright …
